steps.value: Given I am on main application page
When I change window size to `${resolution}`
When I save `content` attribute value of element located `elementName(version):a` to ((story)) variable `ui-version`

scenarios.title: check profile menu

steps.value: When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-account-menu)`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@datatype='jnj-flyout-popover'])`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-profile-menu`

scenarios.title: check that the user is redirected to the Landing page after clicking on logo

steps: When I go to relative URL `<page>`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-logo)` appears
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-logo)`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is equal to `/`

steps.value: When I go to relative URL `((/my-cases))`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-logo)` appears
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-logo)`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/`
When I go to relative URL `((/live-session))`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-logo)` appears
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-logo)`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/`
When I go to relative URL `((/library))`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-logo)` appears
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-logo)`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/`
When I go to relative URL `((/insights))`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-logo)` appears
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-logo)`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-flyout-menu)`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-my-cases-tile-button']/..)`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-waffle-menu`

scenarios.title: check that user is redirected to correct page after clicking on dropdown tile

steps: When I click on element located by `testId(<tile-id>)`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is equal to `<page-url>`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//header)`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-flyout-menu)`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='<tile-id>']/..)`

steps.value: When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-my-cases-tile-button)))`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `((/my-cases))`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//header)`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-flyout-menu)`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='((jnj-my-cases-tile-button))']/..)`
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-live-session-tile-button)))`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `((/live-session))`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//header)`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-flyout-menu)`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='((jnj-live-session-tile-button))']/..)`
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-library-tile-button)))`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `((/library))`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//header)`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-flyout-menu)`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='((jnj-library-tile-button))']/..)`
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-insights-tile-button)))`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `((/insights))`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//header)`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-flyout-menu)`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='((jnj-insights-tile-button))']/..)`

steps: When I go to relative URL `<page-url>`
When I click on element located by `<locator>`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-close-icon-action-panel']/parent::*)`
Then text `<title>` exists
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-action-panel']/child::*[3])`

When I execute javascript `return document.querySelector('[data-test-id="jnj-action-panel"]>:nth-child(3)>:nth-child(2)>:nth-child(1)').style.color='transparent';` and save result to scenario variable `temp`

When I ${visual-action} baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-side-bar-filter-disabled` ignoring:
|ELEMENT                                               |
|By.xpath(//header), By.xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']) |
When I save number of elements located `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*)` to SCENARIO variable `options`
When I click on element located by `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*)->filter.index(#{generate(regexify '[2-${options}]')})`

When I ${visual-action} baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-side-bar-filter-enabled` ignoring:
|ELEMENT                                               |
|By.xpath(//header), By.xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']) |
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-close-icon-action-panel)`

steps.value: When I go to relative URL `((/insights))`
When I click on element located by `((testId(jnj-filter-button-procedure-filter)))`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-close-icon-action-panel']/parent::*)`
Then text `((Filter By Procedure))` exists
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-action-panel']/child::*[3])`

When I execute javascript `return document.querySelector('[data-test-id="jnj-action-panel"]>:nth-child(3)>:nth-child(2)>:nth-child(1)').style.color='transparent';` and save result to ((scenario)) variable `temp`

When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-side-bar-filter-disabled` ignoring:［
|ELEMENT                                               |
|By.xpath(//header), By.xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']) |］
When I save number of elements located `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*)` to ((SCENARIO)) variable `options`
When I click on element located by `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*)->filter.index(#{generate(regexify '[2-${options}]')})`

When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-side-bar-filter-enabled` ignoring:［
|ELEMENT                                               |
|By.xpath(//header), By.xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']) |］
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-close-icon-action-panel)`

steps: When I go to relative URL `<page-url>`
When I click on element located by `<locator>`
Then number of elements found by `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*[1]/child::*[@aria-disabled='true'])` is = `1`
Then number of elements found by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id="jnj-apply-button-action-panel"][@disabled])` is = `1`
When I save number of elements located `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*)` to SCENARIO variable `options`
Given I initialize SCENARIO variable `selected-option` with value `#{generate(regexify '[2-${options}]')}`
When I click on element located by `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*)->filter.index(${selected-option})`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-apply-button-action-panel)`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-apply-button-action-panel)` disappears
When I click on element located by `<locator>`
Then number of elements found by `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*[1]/child::*[1][not(@aria-disabled='true')])` is = `1`
Then number of elements found by `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*[${selected-option}]/child::*[@aria-disabled='true'])` is = `1`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-cancel-button-action-panel)`

steps.value: When I go to relative URL `((/insights))`
When I click on element located by `((testId(jnj-filter-button-procedure-filter)))`
Then number of elements found by `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*[1]/child::*[@aria-disabled='true'])` is ((=)) `1`
Then number of elements found by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id="jnj-apply-button-action-panel"][@disabled])` is ((=)) `1`
When I save number of elements located `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*)` to ((SCENARIO)) variable `options`
Given I initialize ((SCENARIO)) variable `selected-option` with value `#{generate(regexify '[2-${options}]')}`
When I click on element located by `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*)->filter.index(${selected-option})`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-apply-button-action-panel)`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-apply-button-action-panel)` disappears
When I click on element located by `((testId(jnj-filter-button-procedure-filter)))`
Then number of elements found by `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*[1]/child::*[1][not(@aria-disabled='true')])` is ((=)) `1`
Then number of elements found by `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*[${selected-option}]/child::*[@aria-disabled='true'])` is ((=)) `1`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-cancel-button-action-panel)`
